page.title: 18EDUCATION FACILITIES
page.content: There are Government funded schools, some of which are Special schools, Independent schools,Language schools for foreign students and pre-school play groups.94.4%of these places are occupied by day pupils. 55.8% live in the City,33.6% live outside the City and 10.6% live out of Devon. Most schools are well equipped with televisions,videos,and computers but sporting facilities appear to be restricted.Many schools offer a range of extra curricular activities. All schools have some form of central heating as a minimum temperature has to be maintained. 57.8% children eat school lunches 35.4% provide their own and 6.85% go out of school. On completion of statutory education 64% goto Further education,14.5% to Y.T.S.16.5% to work,4.5% unemployed.
